body.name: Ergonomic Home Office Desk Chair - Executive Big Tall High Back with Comfy Lumbar Support & Flip-Up Armrest, PU Leather Computer Gaming Task with Swivel Wheels, Height Adjustable, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 7 hrs 54 mins
features: 【SEGMENTED ERGONOMIC BACKREST】Different from other office chairs, our executive office chair adopts a three-dimensional layered sponge cushion, according to the human head, shoulder, back, buttock and legs, to achieve the five-point support effect, in line with the human spine trend, to achieve millimeter-level intimate support, maintain the natural curve of the spine.

【DYNAMIC MULTI-FUNCTIONAL ADJUSTMENT】The desk chair can 360° free and smooth rotation, 4''in seat height adjustment, 135° tilt angle of back, and padded PU leather flip-up armrest. Customize your sitting posture, so that you can easily switch office and nap mode, making your office space more comfortable and relaxed.

【HIGH DENSITY & RESILIENCE SPONGE】The ergonomic chair uses memory sponge material that can adapt to the body curve according to the pressure of a human; High density makes the cushion have high elasticity and durability, not easy to collapse. The characteristics of good air permeability and moisture emission keep the seat dry and clean.

【HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL】Our computer chairs' exterior is made of expensive and environmentally soft PU leather; The interior adopts thick and non-deformable high resilience sponge; Every part of the chair has been carefully selected, smooth and silent wheels; SGS certified Class 3 gas cylinder; sturdy metal base, tested more than 100,000 times, with BIFIMA certification.

【EASY ASSEMBLY & CLEANING】 We have upgraded and simplified the installation steps. The leather chair comes with the required installation tools, instructions. It only takes about 20 minutes to complete the installation independently. Premium leather removes general dust and stains with just a simple wipe. If you encounter any problems, please feel free to contact our customer service team.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT chair, great price, easy assembly.
reviews.reviewText: I love that the arms go up, so they don’t get rubbed when pushing the chairs in. Very comfortable, perfect game room chairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together, it’s very nice it’s very comfortable nice desugn
reviews.reviewText: My office desk. Love it so far. UPS IS A VERY EXCELLANT DELIVERY COMPANY. NEVER EVERY HAD A PROBLEM WITH A DELIVERY WHEN I KNOW BROWN ( UPS ) IS BRINGING MY PACKAGES.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highy recommend this chair
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend this chair! It is so sleek and incredibly affordable. It is comfortable as well. I own two of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I only just assembled this chair but it seems like it should be a good purchase. The seat is comfortable and I like that the arms can be lifted because sometimes I find arms get in the way depending on how I am sitting at a desk.Assembly of the legs and seat was easy. Attaching the back to the arms was tricky and I ended up doing the bolts out of order from the instructions in order to get them to align. Not that hard once I made the switch but I definitely spent more time fighting with it than I expected. I do appreciate the good hex wrench that was provided as it made screwing in the bolts faster and less straining on the hands than the little cheap ones products usually include.Only other gripe is there is some loose stitching on one of the arms that I didn’t notice until I was well into the assembly. I’ll just cut the strings and hope it holds up. For the money I am overall pleased with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this for working from home so I've spent a decent amount of time in it.It has good lumbar support and is comfortable to use for a full workday.I think it's quite well built. The base is sturdy and the wheels move well on my carpet. The pleather or whatever it is, seems durable and it's easy to clean.The fold up arms were a must for me to keep the chair pushed under my desk out of the way when not in use. Good feature.I do wish the back would recline independently from the seat but you just don't get all the bells and whistles for 69.99. This is an easy 5 star at that price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Affordable
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable chair that meets my needs as I work from home. Only complaint is the back feels a little weird, but once you get used to it it’s fine. It hasn’t squeaked yet which is great. I do wish the seat part was bigger as I like to sit with my legs cross crossed but I am 5’10 and have long legs so there’s not a lot of room to do that with this chair. My boyfriend was able to easily assemble it within about 10-15 minutes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office chair
reviews.reviewText: I bought this one to replace the one I got about 5 years ago. This is so much more comfortable than the old one. The price was right and I am enjoying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and stylish
reviews.reviewText: Chair was easy to assemble and is very comfortable. The chair has good lumbar support and looks great. I’m happy with this purchase.
